Articles.Content:
I like the look of drones, so I messed around and came up with this.

Sorry I don't know how to embed albums/images, I'm sure you'll live. XD

[http://imgur.com/a/v7JfD](http://imgur.com/a/v7JfD)

Hope you enjoy!

-Slab

- - - Updated - - -

Update - I'm having problems with my gear on landing where it becomes unstable and wobbles on the runway. I tried rotating the gear in a tiny bit, I guess I'll try out now. Other than that, any suggestions?
I also made a water variant, so far the only thing it can't do is belly land... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/v7JfD)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-23T07:19:33Z" title="02/23/2015 07:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 23, 2015</time> by ZodiaK**
Lol, those kerbals in the cargo bay look so unhappy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thanks for the replies guys, I improved the CRV and made a CRV-WV(Water Variant) for sea recovery, I'll post pics of that too.
